## Avatar.setFaceExpression() method

Set face expression.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setFaceExpression(name: string, value?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | One of the values get by [Avatar.faceExpressionNames](./three-avatar.avatar.faceexpressionnames.md)<!-- -->. |
|  value | number | _(Optional)_ 0.0 to 1.0 |

void
